channel.title: 508 Nardah
channel.description:
Hey guys welcome to my project thread. the server name is nardah its also the name off the home town. Base: Ranopscape ( palidino ) cleaned it alot removed most skills and i'm redoing them. Server Goal: Trying to make a server thats fun to play and doesnt get boring to fast so skills wont be to fast but also not to slow, there will be Quests to do, that are fun. Also Most Non-cb Skills ( will be alot off work ). Also Pvm, Godwars, Jungel Demon ( gonna try make this a nice boss whit some cool effects and drops. and more. Client Goal: Gonna try make a decent client whit a nice Jframe some buttons for screenshots, music, forum link and stuff, like some 317's. no custom models. no custom Spirits. Updates: 90% Herblore (all pots ,unf and full made, also grinding. still need the chatbox interface i think. 30% Crafting ( only gem crafting atm) 50% Woodcutting ( Tree doesnt die and it doesnt stop wcing when inv is full) 99% Bone bury Skills Combat- -Pvp -Pvm Prayer- [color=green]-Bury[/COLOR] -Altar Range- -Pvp -Pvm Mage- -Pvp -Pvm -Misc Summoning- -All usefull Summoning Beasts. -Beast off burners [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] Runecrafting- [color=#FF0000]-RuneCrafting Whit Abby's -RuneCrafting Whit Tabs[/COLOR] [img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042861/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] Agility- [color=#FF0000]-Gnome -Wildy[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] Crafting- [color=green]-Gem Crafting[/COLOR] [color=#FF0000]-Leather Crafting -GlassBlowing[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] Fletching- [color=#FF0000]-Cutting -String[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] Firemaking- [color=#FF0000]-Burning -Clipped Firemaking[/COLOR] [img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043017/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] Woodcutting- [color=green]-All Trees (Also teak mahony...)[/COLOR] [color=#FF0000]-Tree Falling[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] Fishing- [color=green]-All type off fish[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] Cooking- [color=green]-All Fish[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] Mining- [color=#FF0000]-All Rocks[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/7/7c/Smithing_detail.png[/img] Smithing- [color=#FF0000]-Smelting -Smiting Dfs, Dragon Sq, Godsword making on anvil[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] Farming- [color=#FF0000]-Fruit Trees -Herbs[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] Herblore- [color=green]-Unf pot making -Full pot making -Grinding[/COLOR] [color=#FF0000]-Interface[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img] Hunter- [color=#FF0000]-Lizards[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] Slayer- [color=#FF0000]-Tasks[/COLOR] [color=orange]-Reward Shop[/COLOR] [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img] Thieving- [color=#FF0000]-Pickpocketing[/COLOR] Quests: Demon Slayer a quest where 3 demons are attacking nardah, you have to slay the demons and you will get a nice reward.
"There has been an outbreak of demons, they was once trapped in a cave, but escaped, and they are loose in the cities somewhere, causing mass destruction to everything, your job is too kill them, they're are 3, you will be rewarded handsomley"
Minigames Duel Arena- [color=green]-Friendly[/COLOR] [color=#FF0000]-Staking[/COLOR] Warrior Guild- ... A Few Pictures theres alot more but not feeling like showing everything. [size=12pt]Now on the pictures u can see that i'm wearing a spirit shield and i dit said i wont add customs at the top text i dint remove all models then, i dit now so it doesnt have any custom model anymore. [/size] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16katys.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14kk11i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/juifef.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ahcz89.png[/img] Credits: Palidino for base Ranop for a few things ( removed most ) Me And a few Tuts [color=#FF0000]Not giving a % ![/COLOR] il make this thread better soon. Sry for word that i typed wrong i'm not english ;s

item.title: 508 Nardah
item.dc:creator: @Quel Quel
item.description:
@Quel wrote:

Hey guys welcome to my project thread. the server name is nardah its also the name off the home town.

Base: Ranopscape ( palidino ) cleaned it alot removed most skills and i’m redoing them.

Server Goal: Trying to make a server thats fun to play and doesnt get boring to fast so skills wont be to fast but also not to slow, there will be Quests to do, that are fun. Also Most Non-cb Skills ( will be alot off work ). Also Pvm, Godwars, Jungel Demon ( gonna try make this a nice boss whit some cool effects and drops. and more.

Client Goal: Gonna try make a decent client whit a nice Jframe some buttons for screenshots, music, forum link and stuff, like some 317’s. no custom models. no custom Spirits.

Updates:
90% Herblore (all pots ,unf and full made, also grinding. still need the chatbox interface i think.
30% Crafting ( only gem crafting atm)
50% Woodcutting ( Tree doesnt die and it doesnt stop wcing when inv is full)
99% Bone bury

Skills

Combat-
-Pvp
-Pvm
Prayer-
[color=green]-Bury[/COLOR]
-Altar
Range-
-Pvp
-Pvm
Mage-
-Pvp
-Pvm
-Misc
Summoning-
-All usefull Summoning Beasts.
-Beast off burners

Runecrafting-
[color=#FF0000]-RuneCrafting Whit Abby’s
-RuneCrafting Whit Tabs[/COLOR]

Agility-
[color=#FF0000]-Gnome
-Wildy[/COLOR]

Crafting-
[color=green]-Gem Crafting[/COLOR]
[color=#FF0000]-Leather Crafting
-GlassBlowing[/COLOR]

Fletching-
[color=#FF0000]-Cutting
-String[/COLOR]

Firemaking-
[color=#FF0000]-Burning
-Clipped Firemaking[/COLOR]

Woodcutting-
[color=green]-All Trees (Also teak mahony…)[/COLOR]
[color=#FF0000]-Tree Falling[/COLOR]

Fishing-
[color=green]-All type off fish[/COLOR]

Cooking-
[color=green]-All Fish[/COLOR]

Mining-
[color=#FF0000]-All Rocks[/COLOR]

Smithing-
[color=#FF0000]-Smelting
-Smiting
Dfs, Dragon Sq, Godsword making on anvil[/COLOR]

Farming-
[color=#FF0000]-Fruit Trees
-Herbs[/COLOR]

Herblore-
[color=green]-Unf pot making
-Full pot making
-Grinding[/COLOR]
[color=#FF0000]-Interface[/COLOR]

Hunter-
[color=#FF0000]-Lizards[/COLOR]

Slayer-
[color=#FF0000]-Tasks[/COLOR]
[color=orange]-Reward Shop[/COLOR]

Thieving-
[color=#FF0000]-Pickpocketing[/COLOR]

Quests:
Demon Slayer a quest where 3 demons are attacking nardah, you have to slay the demons and you will get a nice reward.

"There has been an outbreak of demons, they was once trapped in a cave, but escaped, and they are loose in the cities somewhere, causing mass destruction to everything, your job is too kill them, they're are 3, you will be rewarded handsomley"

Minigames
Duel Arena-
[color=green]-Friendly[/COLOR]
[color=#FF0000]-Staking[/COLOR]
Warrior Guild-
…

A Few Pictures theres alot more but not feeling like showing everything.
[size=12pt]Now on the pictures u can see that i’m wearing a spirit shield and i dit said i wont add customs at the top text
i dint remove all models then, i dit now so it doesnt have any custom model anymore.
[/size]

14kk11i.png765×503


2ahcz89.png765×503

Credits:
Palidino for base
Ranop for a few things ( removed most )
Me
And a few Tuts

[color=#FF0000]Not giving a % ![/COLOR]

il make this thread better soon.
Sry for word that i typed wrong i’m not english ;s
